snippet.title: [TAS] Coleco B.C. II: Grog's Revenge by nymx in 03:10.23
snippet.description:
This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/5367M
TAS originally published on 2023-06-25

B.C. II: Grog's Revenge is the sequel to B.C.'s Quest For Tires and was released for the Commodore 64, ColecoVision, and MSX. Thor the cavemen is looking for the meaning of life and travels mountain to mountain trying to discover what it is. To travel across those mountains, however, Thor must pay fellow caveman Peter the clam toll so that he can cross over. To make matters more complicated, Grog seems to have it out for Thor for no particular reason and will try knock him off the mountain whenever he can.

In this run, nymx ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/nymx ) finds the meaning of life in record time.
